event.title: was formally founded as a pueblo on January 8, 1858

data.event: Their petition was granted and Urdaneta was formally founded as a pueblo on January 8, 1858.
This was signed on January 10, 1998 and was voted affirmatively by the people of Urdaneta City on March 21, 1998.

event.title: was voted affirmatively by the people of Urdaneta City on March 21, 1998

data.event: This was signed on January 10, 1998 and was voted affirmatively by the people of Urdaneta City on March 21, 1998.
